html:
12.26.19  2:02 pm   how did you get into doing youtube videos

     i was making non-youtube videos, and then a friend told me i'm an idiot for not putting them on youtube, so i did. they're still non-youtube videos, but you can watch them on youtube if you want

      and is it hard to do what you are doing?

     yes, but also outrageously fun. most of what i do is usually done by teams and companies of people, but i tend to do it all myself. so i get to enjoy all of the challenges, all the nightmares, and all the fun

      btw i really love your videos and youre my inspiration for being creative have a good day 

     holy smokes, you are very friendly

12.26.19  1:48 pm   Are you working on 3d animation?

     obviously

12.26.19  12:33 pm   What color eyeshadow should I wear with a Black dress?

     the opposite color of your eyes

12.26.19  12:30 pm   How do you live a happy life? 

     you have to be sad at least some of the time. it helps you get a more objective outside viewpoint on happiness, which may help you get better at finding it, and better at recognizing it when it arrives

12.26.19  12:21 pm   will a earth round or will he flat?

     it's both. it's round and flat, like a pizza

12.26.19  10:42 am   when's your next video coming out?

     i'm having a count down timer

12.26.19  10:37 am   How many years have passed since i hit mi arm with the chair?

     3 or 4

12.26.19  10:26 am   What is your least favorite and most favorite video that you made?

     i would prefer to make a new one to be my favorite, and if i had a least favorite there is no way i would say it here because the result will be that everyone will go immediately watch it to see how bad it is

12.26.19  9:21 am   I often make music with only one chord. How could I possibly even think about using multible ones?

     start with Emin and A if you play the guitar. or start with Cmin and F if you play the keyboard. with chords, it's much much less about thinking and more about feeling

      How do I learn writing my own music?

     you can literally make it be anything in the universe. and if that's not enough to send you into a life-long existential melt down, then i don't know what else is gonna do it for you

12.26.19  9:06 am   Can i get sheet music for your songs? I want to learn them on my stylophone : )

     what exactly could paper tell you that the audio can't

12.26.19  9:04 am   i got $100 amazon gift card what is something good i could spend it for

     for that kind of money i think you can buy an entire jeff bezos

12.26.19  8:56 am   how many items are in your checklist?

     1 thousand. 999

12.26.19  8:53 am   Thoughts on peanut butter?

     i always get it confused with beanut putter

12.26.19  8:37 am   what is your favorite letter

     r

12.26.19  7:54 am   thoughts on ham?

     it's wet

12.26.19  7:01 am   what is water?

     almost anything you can imagine. but i'll tell you one thing it's not, and that's WET

12.26.19  6:05 am   How do you have think the world will end?

      by starting again and again repeatedly

12.26.19  5:40 am   how was your day

     pretty good

12.26.19  5:27 am   Do you have a pet?

     no

12.26.19  5:02 am   if it turned out animals suffer more in the wild than in domestic captivity, would you still have doubts about the ethics of pets?

     i don't really know anything about the ethics of pets, i just have personal psychological issues about pets because when i was a kid we had a cat and a dog, and the dog ended up killing the cat, and then eventually we moved to a new house and i think we had to kill the dog. i'm pretty sure a lot of people have their pets killed if they can't house them anymore. because i'm assuming most people don't want to buy an old pet. also sometimes people mutilate their genitals ???? whatever. it's none of my business really, but a lot of times people do get very angry at me for simply stating that i would prefer not to own a pet. (example) and one day i just decided i don't want to be called a monster anymore, so i mostly don't talk about it

12.26.19  3:43 am   Not a question, but a comment. Thanks you for making your content, it always puts a smile on my face. Merry Christmas.

     holy smokes, you are very friendly

12.26.19  3:33 am   is music school worth it

     i have no idea

12.26.19  3:33 am   what do you think about china

     legendary

12.26.19  3:31 am   who is bill

     i don't know

      and why is he doing this

     common sense probably

12.26.19  2:56 am   is new zealand real

     yes, although i can't prove it right now

12.26.19  2:16 am   really cool people happen to me sometimes and do a lot for me, and i thus far have failed to reciprocate well. clearly they also have needs. and something i have is adjacent to said needs, but adolescent at best. the way i act suggests i want to be a fun toy they give attention, forever. this obviously sucks and i super want to be someone who can do for them what they do for me. to be as old and shit as i am i clearly have not bent every effort, to incorporate and  develop these magic gifts i get randomly. maybe a people person type of job would give me more opportunity to train. or i could fall into my bad habits and the time would be wasted, though i feel i may be getting too strong for that now. the magic gifts are artifacts of im not sure but surely a path much different than what i've done.

     i am trying to understand your situation, but you seemed to hold back on just enough details that i am still totally clueless about what is going on here. although you wrote it beautifully

12.26.19  1:57 am   how to be happy?

      the answer may surprise you

12.26.19  1:31 am   umm.  12.25.19  1:27 am    
there is b-sharp. you can cleverly teach all you want, but SEVERAL of my favorite preludes and fugues in Bach's well tempered clavier have countless b-sharps

     to explain to a beginner all the way up to the land of B# and Cb would probably be impossible. as it is, my paragraph was probably too long and they probably went to sleep during it. it's like, first you'd have to explain why B and C are only a half step apart instead of a whole step. that's probably weird enough for someone to get their head around. the B# issue would probably only become relevant after a person has fully absorbed the B-C half step issue. but to continue, which i don't know why i would because you must already know, but to continue, sometimes on paper you will see B# which is actually the same note as C. so the next question a person might ask is "why the heck would you ever say B# instead of C" which is a question i'm sure i have answered several times before, such as 11.23.18 11:28 pm, or 5.22.17 12:59 pm actually it looks like that second one actually takes you all the way through, so that's probably what i should have said in order to avoid being called on the complaint line

12.26.19  1:07 am   what role would you like to have tom cruise play in your first movie

     stamps

12.26.19  1:05 am   The end of the year is near.. Do you know how to make videos now?

     almost

12.26.19  12:49 am   i may have questions, but do you have the answers

     yes

12.26.19  12:30 am   thoughts about plants

     they are that leafy friend you always wanted

12.26.19  12:16 am   bill, do you ever stop to just think about the most important friend in the diamond business in your life? very proud of you. -Dad

     who is this

12.26.19  12:04 am   Should I ask a serious question or a surreal meme kind of question?

     if you can combine both, that's the real magic

12.25.19  11:58 pm   are you enjoying your holidays?

     it's hard to tell which days are holi

12.25.19  11:42 pm   it's hard to imagine that anyone would be interested in my crazy ramblings of my life or my feelings.

     have you considered editing and/or post-production

      you encourage people to write stuff down, do you think we should all be figuring out a way to share it or is more for that person to feel better?

     for me it is absolutely essential. i can't even build a lamp without making a dam TV show of it. but i'm beginning to think not everyone is quite like me

12.25.19  10:53 pm   i really want a hug but there's nobody around me (like, as in anyone less than a cross-country flight away) who i feel comfortable hugging. what do i do

     you could try making a burrow

12.25.19  10:11 pm   what sort of microphone do you use for your vocals? also, what sorts of drums and drum microphones do you use (if you do in fact use such)? thanks

     the bad kind

12.25.19  10:01 pm   What did you get for Christmas

     a football

12.25.19  9:36 pm   U a ghost my dude?

     yes, and skeleton. i am a ghost skeleton

12.25.19  9:29 pm   does monkey?

     in all fairness,

12.25.19  9:19 pm   What motivated you to start making iconic videos on Youtube?

     i started making them outside of youtube, and posting them to the website. but then someone told me i was an idiot for not using youtube, so i started putting them on youtube

      (btw your vids are awesome and you should continue :) )

      holy smokes, you are very friendly

12.25.19  9:09 pm   do you change the wording of some questions when you publish them

     absolutely not

12.25.19  8:55 pm   what are your resolutins for new years?

     none. those ones fail. must make resolutions independently of new years. unless you want it to fail, in that case definitely a new years resolution is the way to go, you will forget all about it by jan 6

12.25.19  8:38 pm   Is there any chance you will make the animations you make on YouTube but in 3d?

     how about different animations

12.25.19  8:34 pm   la de da de da de da de day oh - when can you come back home?

     just got home

12.25.19  7:57 pm   if you could learn one language that you don't already know, what would it be?

     one of the chinese ones

12.25.19  7:53 pm   Is the doing the being that's dancing?

     that sounds too right to be wrong

      I think it is and that's what makes what you're doing so importante.

12.25.19  6:57 pm   What are you doing today?

     flipping out

12.25.19  6:46 pm   favorite breakfast meal ? is important.

     rice
